type: Commercially Available Information Technology Training Services (CAITTS)
description: Information Technology training services for participants of the IT Bilateral Program (ITBP)
full_summary:
=====================================

### Commercially Available Information Technology Training Services

**Notice Reference:** WS4635648301-Doc4635648368

**Publication Date:** June 20, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** June 20, 2025, 14:00 Eastern Time (ET)

### Solicitation Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for Commercially Available Information Technology Training Services (CAITTS) under a Standing Offer arrangement. 

### Contract Scope

The CAITTS contract aims to provide Information Technology (IT) training services to various federal government departments and agencies. The successful supplier will be responsible for delivering training services in areas such as:

* Vocational training
* Professional and technical training

### Key Selection Criteria

* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

### Procurement Method

The procurement method is Competitive - Open Bidding. Interested suppliers will need to submit their proposals through the Ariba Discovery portal.

### Contact Information

* Cole, Heather (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [heather.cole@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:heather.cole@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (555) 555-5555 (for Canadians outside of the Service now noting, all can call website)
* URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20078564?extsite=MjAwNzg1NjRfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
